definitions.definition: Of or relating to principles of right and wrong in behaviour , especially for teaching right behaviour.
Conforming to a standard of right behaviour; sanctioned by or operative on one's conscience or ethical judgment .
Capable of right and wrong action.
Positively affecting the mind , confidence , or will .

main_definition: Of or relating to principles of right and wrong in behaviour , especially for teaching right behaviour.
secondary_definitions: Conforming to a standard of right behaviour; sanctioned by or operative on one's conscience or ethical judgment .
Capable of right and wrong action.
